top.title: Several dozen feared dead in Swiss ski resort bar fire

top.title: BBC reports from the scene of Swiss resort bar fire

top.title: Meta buys Chinese-founded AI start-up Manus
top.summary: The tech giant wants to build into its own AI tools which do complex things with minimal interaction.

top.title: A wave paralysed me but AI could help me walk again
